body:
I decided to put my graphic design to the test and try to revamp this amazing server's logo!

What do you think?
body_tagged:
I decided to put my graphic design to the test and try to revamp this amazing server's logo!

What do you think?
title: Avicus Logo REVAMP!!!

replies.body:
That's like a retro version of the current logo! :PP

Looks good however :))
replies.body_tagged:
That's like a retro version of the current logo! :PP

Looks good however :))

replies.body: While it does look good, I don't really think it fits the server's style. The current logo we have is simple and formal, while yours is more informal/cartoonish, not in a bad way.
replies.body_tagged: While it does look good, I don't really think it fits the server's style. The current logo we have is simple and formal, while yours is more informal/cartoonish, not in a bad way.

replies.body: I quite like it :)
replies.body_tagged: I quite like it :)

replies.body: Thanks for the opinions so far, I wasn't making this for the purpose of replacing the current logo. I just did this for fun and for some practice!
replies.body_tagged: Thanks for the opinions so far, I wasn't making this for the purpose of replacing the current logo. I just did this for fun and for some practice!

replies.body: Haha, fancy!
replies.body_tagged: Haha, fancy!

replies.body: Nise!
replies.body_tagged: Nise!

replies.body:
I had a go at trying to make a revamped logo. I haven't done much stuff like this before and I thought it would be good to see what I could do and to get some feedback on it.
Make sure to give me your opinions on it.
replies.body_tagged:
I had a go at trying to make a revamped logo. I haven't done much stuff like this before and I thought it would be good to see what I could do and to get some feedback on it.
Make sure to give me your opinions on it.

replies.body: I like it! Looks like a more professional version of the already existing logo!
